events.message: The insured has reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection, resulting in front bumper damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision.
A claims agent specializing in auto collisions has been assigned to manage and expedite this case.
The claimant has received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple photos of the collision.
Claims investigation team started reviewing submitted evidence and cross-checking details of the auto accident.
Investigation confirmed the collision details and verified that damage estimates are consistent with the accident report.
A settlement offer was sent to the insured covering the repairs and associated expenses for the car accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
Claim approval was granted following acceptance of the settlement offer for the vehicle damage.
Payment was processed and issued to the insured for the approved auto repair costs after the accident.
The auto accident claim has now been successfully closed following payment disbursement and customer confirmation.
The claim file has been archived for future reference and quality assurance in the insurerâ€™s database.
